title: Dance for me 2
description: “Stop, don’t take it off.” Andrea’s a stripper and is used to men telling her to hurry up and take off her clothes. So when her dark haired, sad eyed client tells her to ‘stop’ before she slips off her bra, she thinks she’s done something wrong. At the end of her shift he’s waiting outside to explain why, and his reasons change everything. DANCE FOR ME 2 is the second in a series of romance short stories, suitable for 18+.
author: Holly Stone
